post:
UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co. KG. Since 1999 we offer high quality hosting services to our customers and are amongst the most established providers in Europe. With our product series UltraVPS.eu we offer powerful and reliable virtual servers for low prices.

Our Black Friday Special Offers
-------------------------------

**Cloud-BF**

* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU cores
* 30 GB redundant SSD storage (ZFS based)
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer (in+out)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands), Duesseldorf (Germany), Dallas (USA), Los Angeles (USA)

20 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 20 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver&lang=en)

**Cloud-BF2**

* 2 GB RAM
* 2 CPU cores
* 50 GB redundant SSD storage (ZFS based)
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer (in+out)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands), Duesseldorf (Germany), Dallas (USA), Los Angeles (USA)

40 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 40 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver&lang=en)

**Storage-BF**

* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU core
* 750 GB redundant data storage (ZFS based)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* 5 TB monthly transfer (in+out)
* Contract term: 12 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands)

48 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 48 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_storage&lang=en)

**Storage-BF2**

* 2 GB RAM
* 1 CPU core
* 2 TB redundant data storage (ZFS based)
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* 5 TB monthly transfer (in+out)
* Contract term: 6 months
* Available in Amsterdam (Netherlands)

60 EUR semi-annualy incl. VAT (~ 60 USD excl. VAT)

[[ORDER]](https://www.ultravps.eu/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_storage&lang=en)

Looking glasses

[>> Further Information <<](https://www.ultravps.eu/en/vps/)

Do you have any questions? Please do not hesitate to drop us a mail at info@ultravps.eu.

_These offers are valid for new orders till Monday, 27/10/2017._
